original_text: As you see this, your eyes will shine with joy. Your hearts will beat fast, and you will be proud to see them. Traders will bring valuable things to you from lands across the seas. The riches of other nations will come to you. As you see this, your eyes will shine with joy.
korean_text: 그 때에 네가 보고 기쁜 빛을 내며 네 마음이 놀라고 또 화창하리니 이는 바다의 부가 네게로 돌아오며 이방 나라들의 재물이 네게로 옴이라

sentences.original_text: your eyes will shine with joy
and you will be proud to see them
Traders will bring valuable things to you
sentences.korean_translation: 상인들이 당신에게 귀중한 것들을 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The riches of other nations will come to you
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 나라들의 부가 당신에게 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: your eyes will shine with joy
